DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate two anaesthetic technique namely interscalene brachial plexus block intra-articular local anaesthetic injection . Both technique currently use provide postoperative pain relief follow arthroscopic shoulder stabilisation operation . It randomise control trial involve 30 patient two group .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Interscalene Brachial Plexus Block Intra-articular Injection Ropivacaine Post-operative Analgesia Arthroscopic Shoulder Stabilization Surgery
